section.codeblock: --- name: DimensionStatement sampleBibs: - 25079 - 3802858 # $f - 3811379 fieldSpec: - 3003acf trimPunctuation: true scriptInclusion: NONE

step.cmd: Create separate dimension statements for 3003af (identified as an Extent statement), and for 3003c (identified as a Dimensions statement).
Trim punctuation and normalize space for each subfield, except 3: see instructions below.
If subfield f is present, join subfields af with a whitespace character.

substep.cmd: Test the value of 3 to see whether it ends with a colon.
If no colon is present, concatenate the value with a colon (:).
Join 3 to af and c with a whitespace character.

info.note: The value of 3 should always be prefixed to the other values.

stepxmp.codeblock: 300 $3 Copy 1: $a 1 album (32 photographic prints) : $b b & w ; $c 13.4 x 20.6 cm. 300 $3 Copy 2: $a 1 album (39 photographic prints) : $b b & w ; $c 13.4 x 20.6 cm.
